entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Baddeck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:43 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Eskasoni (First Nations) 03:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: NNE 13 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times heavy beginning near midnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
